metadata.name: Lolbin Unregmp2.exe Use As Proxy
metadata.comment: Detect usage of the "unregmp2.exe" binary as a proxy to launch a custom version of "wmpnscfg.exe"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\unregmp2.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('unregmp2.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -hidewmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /hidewmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –hidewmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —hidewmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―hidewmp'))))

output.summary: Detect usage of the "unregmp2.exe" binary as a proxy to launch a custom version of "wmpnscfg.exe"
